attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before new legislation demanding all Citizens have a government issued ID card I would like to see a couple of caveats actioned :

1 - If a persons "ID" is stolen and this is traced back to a government department then said department and the head of department will be liable for all costs and a custodial sentence.

2 - An explanation is given behind every bit of data and the requirement for it.

3 - Exact figures published monthly of the crime reduction directly attributed to the creation of ID cards.

4 - The number of terrorists caught as a result of the introduction of ID cards.

5 - In law the prohibition of any of the information given on ID cards to be used in any way to discriminate against any group of individuals - The Home Secretary and PM to held responsible in Law with severe penalties should this be breached.

rejection.details: The title should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
